

기존 URL 
http://his012edu.cmcnu.or.kr/himed/webapps/com/commonweb/xrw/.live?submit_id=TXLII00109&business_id=lis&ex_interface=20800727|012&bcno=15397360&deptcd=3060100000&drid=97015067&testdt=20161115165752&result=LOS186174817172016111503LOS1821714317172016111503LOS183174.417172016111503LOS179171.1917172016111503LOS161177.43817172016111503LOS1621741.917172016111503LOS1631774.717172016111503LOS1801724717172016111503LOS137171.4717172016111503LOS1701716.317172016111503LOS1641728.317172016111503LOS165173.617172016111503LOS1671795.317172016111503&instcd=012&eqmtcd=C22&userid=20800727&

his로 시작하는 URL은 1.0 버전이고  올해말까지만 서비스계획이라서 
2.0 버전 emr로 시작하는 URL로 변경해주셔야됩니다. 
프로그램 수정배포도 2.0만 가능해서 아래처럼 변경해주셔야 변경된내용 적용됩니다.  


이렇게 변경되는거고 뒤에 parameter는 같습니다. 
   http://his012edu.cmcnu.or.kr/himed/webapps/com/commonweb/xrw/.live?submit_id=TXLII00109&   (교육서버1.0)
=> http://emr012edu.cmcnu.or.kr/cmcnu/.live?submit_id=TXLII00109&   (교육서버2.0)

   http://his012.cmcnu.or.kr/himed/webapps/com/commonweb/xrw/.live?submit_id=TXLII00109&   (운영서버1.0)
=> http://emr012.cmcnu.or.kr/cmcnu/.live?submit_id=TXLII00109&   (운영서버2.0)



검체선택 없이 보낼때 
http://emr012edu.cmcnu.or.kr/cmcnu/.live?submit_id=TXLII00109&business_id=li&ex_interface=20800727|012&bcno=3686825&deptcd=3060100000&drid=97015067&testdt=20161115165752&result=LOS186174817172016111503LOS1821714317172016111503LOS183174.417172016111503LOS179171.1917172016111503LOS161177.43817172016111503LOS1621741.917172016111503LOS1631774.717172016111503LOS1801724717172016111503LOS137171.4717172016111503LOS1701716.317172016111503LOS1641728.317172016111503LOS165173.617172016111503LOS1671795.317172016111503&instcd=012&eqmtcd=C22&userid=20800727&


검체선택 해서 보낼때 spccd=002 or spccd=003 or spccd=004  이중 하나 붙여서 보내주시면됩니다. 
http://emr012edu.cmcnu.or.kr/cmcnu/.live?submit_id=TXLII00109&business_id=li&ex_interface=20800727|012&bcno=18828239&deptcd=3060100000&drid=97015067&testdt=20161115165752&result=LOS186174817172016111503LOS1821714317172016111503LOS183174.417172016111503LOS179171.1917172016111503LOS161177.43817172016111503LOS1621741.917172016111503LOS1631774.717172016111503LOS1801724717172016111503LOS137171.4717172016111503LOS1701716.317172016111503LOS1641728.317172016111503LOS165173.617172016111503LOS1671795.317172016111503&instcd=012&eqmtcd=C22&userid=20800727&spccd=002

http://emr012edu.cmcnu.or.kr/cmcnu/.live?submit_id=TXLII00109&business_id=li&ex_interface=20800727|012&bcno=8660895&deptcd=3060100000&drid=97015067&testdt=20161115165752&result=LOS186174817172016111503LOS1821714317172016111503LOS183174.417172016111503LOS179171.1917172016111503LOS161177.43817172016111503LOS1621741.917172016111503LOS1631774.717172016111503LOS1801724717172016111503LOS137171.4717172016111503LOS1701716.317172016111503LOS1641728.317172016111503LOS165173.617172016111503LOS1671795.317172016111503&instcd=012&eqmtcd=C22&userid=20800727&spccd=004


spccd  검체명 
002 = Arterial blood 
003 = Capillary blood 
004 = EDTA blood
